column4: I'm trying to install ubunutu on an old laptop, but it is not going so well. Atm. the screen looks swedish (lots of yellow and blue rectangles), anyone seen that before?
The computer is from 2003, 1.7GHz intel Dothan cpu, 512mb ram and radeon 9700 - is the computer just too old for ubuntu?
sounds like it might be a bit low on RAM.
